0005ef1a-cef1-8000-e898-7f0000014e7a.name: AS GSS GCW Update Evaluation Folder Security For Solicitation

_a-0000eb72-c933-8000-9d28-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QR_getEvaluation
_a-0000eb72-c933-8000-9d28-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields,
  fields: ri!fields,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationNumber,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationNumber
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationStatusId,
      operator: "in",
      value: {
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_AWARDEES_SELECTED,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_COMPLETE
      }
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  sort: ri!sort
)
